column2: After centuries of decay, the ancient walls of Rome have become a shell of their former glory and military capability, it is time we fix this

Centuries of decay and barbarian occupation and neglect have left the city of Rome and its famous monuments pale ghosts of their former glory.  Now that this disgraceful era has come to an end, we must repair the city to its full glory once more.
Commission a Great Palace in Rome
Now that the city has been brought back to its Imperial Glory, why not build a new palace in Rome?
